trans-unit.target: 十个公会的领导人不愿直接会面，宁可藉由不受贿赂与威胁的中间人来正式交涉。

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放史迹咒语时，重置刹索斯。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

trans-unit.source: The continent of Murasa lies beneath a blanket of dense vegetation, its enormous branches tangled so thickly that some inhabitants never see the ground.
trans-unit.target: 姆拉撒大陆上覆厚密植被，庞巨盘枝交错横生，尚有居民从未见过其下大地。

trans-unit.target: {5}，{T}：加五点法术力，其颜色组合由你选择。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·202 | Cascading Cataracts | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The rushing water is as the God-Pharaoh. It encompasses all. It nurtures all."\n—Temmet, vizier of Naktamun
trans-unit.target: 「这奔腾流水一如法老神：包容众生，滋养万物。」 ～拿塔蒙维齐尔蒂穆特

trans-unit.resname: DMC·203 | Cinder Glade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

trans-unit.resname: DMC·204 | Command Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Approach my tower on bended knee or depart from it as ash upon the wind."\n—Gadwick, the Wizened
trans-unit.target: 「近我高塔者，须诚心屈膝求见，否则便会化作轻烟飘去。」 ～老年法师盖威克

trans-unit.target: 自从鹏洛客安戈斯把恐龙称为「龙」之后，这种称呼便在海盗圈子中流传了下来。

trans-unit.target: 任一世界都是个有机体，能让新的地成长。有些只是作得比其他的都快。

trans-unit.source: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."\n—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo
